workflow.name: Audio transcription with Telegram and Groq Whisper
workflow.description:
## Short description
Transcribe Telegram voice/audio messages to text using Groq‚Äôs OpenAI-compatible Whisper endpoint. Replies are delivered either as a Telegram message or as a downloadable `.txt` file, plug-and-play for n8n with minimal setup.

## Who‚Äôs it for / Uses
- Educators, podcasters, interviewers, and support teams who need quick voice ‚Üí text conversions.  
- Automating meeting notes, voice feedback, voicemail transcription, or speech logging.  
- Useful when you want transcripts pushed to chat or saved as files for archiving.

## How it works (overview)
1. **Telegram Trigger** ‚Äî workflow starts on incoming message.  
2. **Switch (Audio/Voice)** ‚Äî detects `voice` or `audio`. If neither, replies ‚ÄúWrong file type‚Äù and stops.  
3. **Telegram Download** ‚Äî downloads the audio using the `file_id`, outputs file path/binary.  
4. **Set Node (credentials + options)** ‚Äî stores `Groq_API` and `Telegram_access_token` (required) and `transcript_output_format` (`message` or `file`).  
5. **HTTP Request ‚Üí Groq (Whisper)** ‚Äî uploads audio (multipart/form-data) to Groq‚Äôs transcription endpoint and receives text.  
6. **Reply Switch** ‚Äî routes to either:  
   - **Message branch:** send transcribed text as a Telegram message.  
   - **File branch:** convert transcript to `.txt` and send as a document.

## Requirements
- n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted) with internet access  
- Telegram bot token (create via BotFather)  
- Groq API key (create at https://console.groq.com/keys)  
- Basic n8n nodes: Telegram Trigger, Switch, Telegram Download, Set, HTTP Request, Convert to File, Telegram Send Message/Document

## Important setup & notes
- **Mandatory:** Add `Groq_API` and `Telegram_access_token` in the **Set** node (or use n8n Credentials). The workflow will fail without them.  
- **Do not hardcode** keys in HTTP node fields that will be exported/shared. Use Set fields or n8n Credentials.  
- Include **sticky notes** explaining each node (yellow note with full description recommended). Sticky notes should show setup steps and required fields.  
- Before publishing: remove personal IDs and secrets, test with sample voice messages, and verify Groq response schema to map the transcript field correctly.

## Security & best practices
- Use n8n Credentials or environment variables in production.  
- Rotate API keys if they become exposed.  
- Keep the Set node private when sharing templates; instruct users to replace keys with their own.

parameters.text: Yo! I only take audioüòÖ, drop a audio message instead!

parameters.content:
# Telegram Trigger

- Triggers workflow when a message is received in your Telegram bot.
- Setup:
  1. Create a bot via BotFather.
  2. Add bot token in this node.
  3. Choose event type (Message or Command).

# Audio/Voice Switch

- Checks if the incoming Telegram message is an audio file or a voice message.  
- If valid, sets the file ID for further processing.  
- If the message is not audio/voice:
  - Sends a "Wrong file type. Please send an audio or voice message." notification back to the user via Telegram.  
  - Stops the workflow immediately to prevent further execution.  
- Routes messages based on type for downstream nodes.

# Telegram Download

- Downloads the audio/voice file from Telegram using the file ID.  
- Outputs the **file path** for use in downstream nodes.

# Set & HTTP Nodes for Transcription

- **Purpose:** Prepares credentials and transcribes audio using OpenAI Whisper via Groq API.  

### Set Node
- Contains fields for your credentials:  
  - `Groq_API` ‚Üí Enter your **Groq API key** (can be created for free at [Groq Console](https://console.groq.com/keys)).  
  - `Telegram_access_token` ‚Üí Enter your **Telegram bot token**.  
- Both fields are **mandatory** for this automation to work.  
- Ensures downstream nodes have the necessary authentication to access Telegram and Groq API.

### HTTP Node
- Sends the audio file to the **Groq API** for transcription using the OpenAI Whisper model.  
- Uses credentials set in the Set node (`Groq_API`) for authorization.  
- Outputs the transcribed text for further processing in the workflow.  

> ‚ö†Ô∏è **Important:** Without entering the Telegram access token and the Groq API key in the Set node, the workflow will **not function**.

# Telegram Reply Option & Switch

- Lets user choose how to receive the transcription:  
  - As a **Telegram message**  
  - As a **.txt file**  
- Switch node routes workflow into two branches based on the selected option.

# Telegram Send Message

- Sends the transcribed text directly to the user as a Telegram message.  
- Triggered when the user chooses the **message** option in the previous switch node.

# Set, Convert & Send Transcript as File

- **Set Node:** Stores the transcribed text in a field.  
- **Convert to File Node:** Converts the text field into a `.txt` file.  
- **Telegram Send Document Node:** Sends the `.txt` file to the user.  
- Triggered when the user chooses the **.txt file** option in the switch node.

# Description
Transcribe Telegram voice/audio to text using Groq's OpenAI-compatible Whisper endpoint, then return the transcript either as a Telegram message or as a `.txt` file.

## How it works (brief)
1. **Telegram Trigger** ‚Äî receives incoming message.  
2. **Switch (Audio/Voice)** ‚Äî if `voice` or `audio` ‚Üí set `file_id`; else send "Wrong file type" and stop.  
3. **Telegram Download** ‚Äî download audio using `file_id`, output **file path/binary**.  
4. **Set Node (credentials)** ‚Äî **must** set `Groq_API` and `Telegram_access_token` fields for the workflow to work.  
5. **HTTP Node ‚Üí Groq (Whisper)** ‚Äî POST audio (multipart) to Groq‚Äôs transcription endpoint; get text.  
6. **Reply Switch** ‚Äî choose **message** or **.txt file**.  
   - **Message branch:** Telegram Send Message ‚Üí sends transcript text.  
   - **File branch:** Set transcript ‚Üí Convert to `.txt` ‚Üí Telegram Send Document ‚Üí sends file.

## Requirements
- n8n instance with internet access  
- Telegram bot token (BotFather)  
- Groq API key (https://console.groq.com/keys)  

## Notes / Security
- Enter `Groq_API` and `Telegram_access_token` in the **Set** node (or n8n Credentials).  
- Do **not** hardcode keys in public nodes.  
- Workflow stops after sending "Wrong file type" when incoming message is not audio/voice.

user.name: Abhiman
user.bio: Automation consultant helping creators and small teams streamline their workflows using Notion and n8n. I build systems that save time, boost productivity, and keep everything running smoothly. Check my LinkedIn to connect or collaborate on custom automations.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
